com.zello.sdk

Class Contacts

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zello.sdk.Contacts

  • public class Contacts
extends java.lang.Object

    The Contacts class represents the contacts that the authenticated user has.

    To use, retrieve the current Contacts instance using the Zello.getContacts() method. For specific usage, please see the sample projects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCount()
      Returns the number of Contacts that the user has.
      Contact getItem(int index)
      Returns the Contact at the specified index.
